author: wburnss
post_text: April 18, 2015 at 4:15 PM#1HI,Is there a way to copy value of an attribute to an other one ?A beyeK20 in mode shapes but with one instance was created, so I want to copy values from COLORRGB attributes to SHAPECOLOR attributes.Thanks.
